app.name: WiiSX
app.long_description:
Wii64 Team is: General Coder - emu_kidid Graphics & Menu Coder - sepp256 Audio & Core Coder - tehpola
The Wii64Team proudly presents WiiSX Beta 2.1 WiiSX is a port of PCSX to the Wii
Special Thanks to: drmr - Graphics shagkur/WinterMute - libogc/devkitPPC Team Twiizers for Wii homebrew
